amendment.description: To implement the Agreement on the conservation and Management of the Alaska-Chukotka Polar Bear Population.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5220 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5220 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR 12/7/2006 S11387) To implement the Agreement on the conservation and Management of the Alaska-Chukotka Polar Bear Population.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5220 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5220 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
